id-53724.title: Food Blogger & Influencer
id-53724.post-content:
Are you a food blogger, an influencer, or both? Want to build a website and become an authority in your niche? We've got you covered with this Food Blogger & Influencer website template. 

It's elegant, professional, and clean — perfect for showcasing your content, be it reviews of exotic new dishes or the latest restaurant in the neighborhood. Plus, it's got social media integrations so you can easily share and engage with your audience.

Key features of the Food Blogger & Influencer template

  • Clean, professional, and elegant website template
  • Easy to use with social media integrations
  • Option to include latest review videos as well
  • Build your email list with the newsletter sign-up form integrated on the homepage
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-53724.post-excerpt: Perfect website template for food bloggers, influencers or restaurant reviews

id-53593.title: The Pizzeria
id-53593.post-content:
Here’s a pizza website template that is not only beautiful but also functional. We’ve made this template as easy to use as possible so you can focus on the important aspects of your pizzeria business: making delicious pizza and taking care of your customers. 

This package includes a professionally designed website template, a facility to order online, an online menu, a table booking module so customers can reserve their tables in advance, social media integration, and client testimonials.

Key features of The Pizzeria template

  • Professionally and creatively designed template
  • Includes everything you need to build a top-notch pizza ordering system
  • Visually appealing design
  • Placeholders to display the best deals and offers
  • Fully customizable and flexible layout
id-53593.post-excerpt: The perfect pizzeria website template to build an online pizza ordering platform

id-73478.title: Freelance Digital Designer
id-73478.post-content:
The Freelance Digital Designer template is an energetic portfolio design that does a great job of hooking you in so you want to explore more. That’s a great feature of a page designed to attract new clients.

The design is modern, flat and alternates between dark and light with an orange contrast color. You can change all this if you like, but the default design has everything you need including a portfolio, contact page, biography and the opportunity to fully personalize.

Key features of the Freelance Digital Designer template

  • Energetic design that’s instantly engaging
  • All the essential ingredients for a portfolio website
  • Attractive pages and lots of imagery
  • Useful supplementary pages including biography and portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73478.post-excerpt: Freelance Digital Designer offers the perfect opportunity to attract new clients.

id-59435.title: eBook Author
id-59435.post-content:
The eBook Author web template is designed to promote your latest work while also making space for existing creations. It’s a light, personable design with lovely colors and fonts, effective imagery and a nice feel overall.

The template includes a well designed homepage with flexible content areas and specific pages for biography and books. It can integrate with WooCommerce if you want to sell your books as well as promote them.

Key features of the eBook Author template

  • Makes it easy to promote yourself and your work
  • Light, easygoing colors and fonts
  • Can integrate with WooCommerce to sell as well as promote
  • Flexible content areas that can be fully customized
  • Attractive product page to promote all your books
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
id-59435.post-excerpt: Show off your work with this attractive portfolio template, ideal for any creative

id-71207.title: Vlogger
id-71207.post-content:
The Vlogger website template is a fullscreen resume and portfolio design full of color, vibrancy and engagement. It opens with a simple image of the vlogger with headline introduction before unfolding into a description, video element, blog posts, social media links and contact area.

If you’re a vlogger or into modern media, this template is ideal for providing a professional persona to potential clients, backers or supporters. It’s modern, attractive and makes the positive impact you need to get ahead.

Key features of the Vlogger template

  • Attractive fullscreen Vlogger website design
  • Great use of colors and typography throughout
  • Designed as a resume or portfolio website
  • Can be fully customized to make it unique
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71207.post-excerpt: Attractive vlogger template ideal for anyone in modern media

id-70940.title: Christmas Party
id-70940.post-content:
The Christmas Party website template is light, bright and ready to celebrate. It’s a fullscreen design ideal for showcasing a Christmas party, festival, performance or other celebration. It’s a great way to get viewers in the mood while promoting your event.

The Christmas Party template uses plenty of red with strong white fonts and a neat animated snowflake effect. The page includes elements to showcase the what, when and where of your event alongside customizable areas to use as you need.

Key features of the Christmas Party template

  • Festive Christmas Party website design
  • Neat animated snowflake effect to get you in the mood
  • Includes all essential page elements for events
  • Can be fully customized to fit your brand
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-70940.post-excerpt: Festive Christmas Party template that’s great for the holidays

id-71025.title: Locksmith
id-71025.post-content:
The Locksmith website template proves small business websites can be special. It’s a slick design with a strong header image and call to action with calming colors to help inspire confidence.

The Locksmith website design uses strong colors and fonts on a white background alongside strong images to make an impact. It includes essential service sections, an about us, reviews and areas to help you build authority and confidence. Everything a locksmith needs to attract new business.

Key features of the Locksmith template

  • Modern small business locksmith template
  • Calm design that inspires confidence
  • Includes relevant service and authority sections
  • Can be fully customized to make it stand out
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71025.post-excerpt: Modern flat locksmith template that can be customized with ease

id-66946.title: Electric Scooter
id-66946.post-content:
The Electric Scooter template is an eCommerce design with a contemporary feel. It opens with a large product section and unfolds into a wide open store template with a parallax effect that works incredibly well.

The design uses open design and feels welcoming and engaging. Combined with high quality images, modern fonts and plenty of whitespace, there’s a professional feel to this template. Ideal for new stores or those dealing with big ticket items.

Key features of the Electric Scooter template

  • Modern eCommerce templates with modern touches
  • Neutral colors and modern fonts
  • Open design with lots of whitespace
  • Fully compatible with WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-66946.post-excerpt: Modern eCommerce design with an open light feel ideal for online stores

id-57006.title: Business Magazine
id-57006.post-content:
Get your business magazine website template and share the latest in the business world with your audience. Keep them informed on all the latest business trends, ideas, and updates with this online magazine template.

The user-friendly and clutter-free layout features a variety of integrated social media links and newsletter subscription forms, making it easy to stay on top of the latest business news, trends, and opportunities.

Key features of the Business Magazine template

  • User-friendly and clutter-free website template
  • Placeholders for trending news, editor’s picks, and world news
  • Social media integrations and newsletter sign-up form
  • Include the latest videos or even podcast episodes
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-57006.post-excerpt: The Business Magazine template has been crafted for the modern business professional

id-69404.title: Furniture Shop
id-69404.post-content:
The Furniture Shop template is a contemporary eCommerce design that looks modern and has instant appeal. It’s a full page template that opens with a strong fullscreen header with headline and call to action.

The rest of the template uses lots of whitespace and superb layout while allowing the products to be the star of the show. There are featured product sections, attractive product pages and a simple navigation bar with a shopping cart. Everything you need to sell.

Key features of the Furniture Shop template

  • Contemporary fullscreen eCommerce template
  • Great use of colors, fonts and images
  • Attractive product pages
  • Simple navigation with search and cart
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69404.post-excerpt: Contemporary eCommerce template with modern design and modern feel

id-52215.title: Wine Bar and Restaurant
id-52215.post-content:
Miss the days of going to the wine bar and restaurant with your friends? We've designed this website template with you in mind. The wine bar and restaurant website template is an elegant and classy template that’ll make you feel like you're at a wine bar without leaving home.

Customize it to your liking by adding or removing elements or changing colors. With an online order form, you can even deliver wines right to your customer’s doorstep.

Key features of the Wine Bar and Restaurant template

  • Elegant and classy website design
  • WooCommerce-ready template to facilitate the sale of wine
  • Impressive photo gallery on the homepage
  • Option to facilitate table reservations and online ordering
  • Page builder ready and fully customizable
id-52215.post-excerpt: Elegant and classy design that will make your website stand out from the competition

id-73520.title: Local Bakery
id-73520.post-content:
The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template is an engaging way to showcase your skills and your work and share links to other resources. It’s a landing page and then some, offering far more than Linktree, including fully responsive pages.

The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template has a lovely design with calm colors, attractive center blocks with images and links and a slider block to show off your skills. It’s also fully responsive so will work on any screen size.

Key features of the Local Baker linktree template

  • Attractive Link-in-Bio template with genuine appeal
  • Nice colors and can be fully customized
  • Responsive design that will work flawlessly on any device
  • Includes options for all types of links
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73520.post-excerpt: The Local Baker Link-in-Bio template is the ideal landing page to share your links.

id-66934.title: Innesa Perfumes
id-66934.post-content:
The Inessa Perfumes website template is an elegant eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of online stores. It has an upmarket look, with fullscreen header, well-chosen fonts and an excellent product showcase section further down the page.

The combination of fonts, colors and whitespace give a premium feel while minimal navigation keeps things tidy while delivering user intent. The template is fully compatible with WooCommerce and sales funnel plugins, so should deliver all the features you need.

Key features of the Inessa Perfumes template

  • Elegant eCommerce theme
  • Stylish colors and fonts throughout
  • Borderless content areas for an open feel
  • Attractive product area
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-66934.post-excerpt: Elegant eCommerce template ideal for selling luxury items to discerning customers
